I think I have just the thing for you! Considering your interest in Alan B. McElroy's writing and the war genre, I highly recommend "There Be Dragons" (2011). This historical drama is a thought-provoking exploration of faith, identity, and redemption set against the backdrop of the Spanish Civil War. The film features a talented cast, including Lily Cole and Dougray Scott.

If you're looking for something else, "Patriot Games" (1987) is also an excellent choice. As an action-packed thriller, it follows CIA analyst Jack Ryan as he navigates international espionage and personal danger. Harrison Ford brings his signature charm to the title role, making this a must-see for fans of the genre!
